description:
Kanbara Akihito is an immortal half-demon and the protagonist of this story. Due to his rare heritage, he is unable to become a underworlder or a Youmu. Due to this, he feels very isolated from the rest of the world, but he has lived his life trying to ignore that fact. He is a huge fan of glasses, and calls himself the Meganest (Glasses-est). He is a second-year student in high school and a member of the literature club.
Source: ANN
name: Kanbara Akihito
